findings.title: Sending tokens to dead address instead of burning
findings.description: In overridden _transfer functions, tokens are sent to a dead address rather than being burned in the token contract.

findings.title: Owner can mint before transferring ownership to MasterChef.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to mint tokens before transferring ownership to MasterChef, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Operator can change the operator.
findings.description: The operator has the privilege to modify themselves, which could lead to unauthorized changes and potential security risks.

findings.title: Operator can change the transfer tax rate.
findings.description: The operator has the privilege to modify the transfer tax rate, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Operator can change the burn rate.
findings.description: The operator has privileges to modify the burn rate, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Operator can change the max transfer amount rate
findings.description: The operator has the privilege to modify the maximum transfer amount rate, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Operator can exclude and include in antiWhale
findings.description: The operator has privileges to exclude and include in antiWhale, which may lead to potential security issues.

findings.title: Operator can change the min amount to liquify.
findings.description: The operator has the privilege to modify the minimum amount required for liquidity, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Operator Can Change Router and Pair Contract Addresses
findings.description: The operator has the privilege to change the router and pair contract addresses, which could lead to interacting with unaudited contracts.
